comment: If you value your GPA do not take this class. Her tests are all straight essay. They are a lot of content and require a lot of studying just to make a C. She lectures straight from memory no powerpoint. If you miss something, oh well! She has an accent but isn't hard to understand. The class is way to hard for this to be a gen ed course.
She is AMAZING! Absolutely loved her and her style of teaching. It's almost like she's telling a story. I hated History before taking her class, and now I am more than interested in it.
I wish I could take another class of hers. You do have to study and come to class, but I learned so much, and she is incredibly engaging to listen to. Take her.
Weird style of teaching. Almost high school like. You are on her pace, and if you miss something you just miss it. Kinda hard to understand.

This is by far the best teacher I have ever had. She teachers history like a story and has a great sense of humor. She doesn't just point at a power point. If you listen and take notes, you can't go wrong. I could not recommend her more.

Ms. Vlachos knows her stuff.  She does not use the book but she has it memorized.  I definitely reccomend that you bring a tape recorder.  Her tests are difficult but she tells you what is on it before hand. If you are struggling but are putting forth the effort don't hesitate to ask her for some extra help.She is no nonsense but extremely helpful.

She's sweet but only after class is over. She talks super fast, will not repeat herself or slow down. If you miss a day or can't keep up by writing down EVERYTHING she says you will probably fail. Over 80% of my classmates failed. She does give out the test ahead of time but you must put down her answers not just a correct one & grammar does count.

This class is incredibly challenging, but worth it! I have Mrs. V for World History, and she starts weeding out the slackers from day one. In order to be successful in the class, you have to WORK. If you don't have an interest in putting in copious time and effort, you will most likely drop or fail the class. Not an easy A, but i LOVE IT

Love Love Love this teacher. I love her approach and learnt a lot from her. She challenges you but it is worth it. All exams are essay but she gives you the question to study ahead. if you come to class and take notes, you will be fine. get a tape recorder too so you can do well in this class. it is a good stress class. you will love history.

she is a wonderful teacher, she not easy but if you can take notes fast and write everything that she says you'll be find. Its best to bring a tape recorder it'll make the class much easier. she a good History teacher and knows her stuff

This class was HORRIBLE. All the tests were essay answers. She gives you the questions to the tests, but you have to answer them the way SHE wants you to. I had most of the questions answered correctly but still failed. AND she counts off for grammar. Also, she doesn't put anything online and talks fast. Get yourself a recorder.

She is so sweet she seems tough but she isn't. If you ask her questions she gives u answers. She gives you the questions and answer to every test s if you fail, you must not care. The only hard test is the final because it's long but STUDY and ask questions. Dont bother buying the book, borrow it from a friend. She's very nice and a great teacher.
